values: 满足；遇见；结识；认识；被引见给…；会见；会面；开会；会晤；迎接；交手；交战；交汇；相交；接触；连接；经历；遭遇；支付；对付；应付；实现（计划）；履行（诺言）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重双方静止地面对面，或指指充满勇气、信心和决心正视人或事。
通常指遇到困难或挫折，也指偶然或意外地相遇。
普通用词，本义指双方或多方从不同方向或相反方向作向对运动，最终相碰(遇)。
多指通过书信、电话或直接会面和别人联系。口语用词。
不可避免的，面对面的相遇。也指敢于正视困难或问题的决心和信心。
指完全达到预定的条件、要求、标准或期望、心愿等。
指最低限度地达到预期的标准，或强调要达到这个标准的困难。
与satisfy基本同义，但侧重指实现的情况好于一般标准。

word_group.brief_definition: 收支相抵, 勉强维持
量入为出；勉强维持生计
使收支相抵；量入为出；勉强维持生计
二者永远合不到一起, 泾渭分明, 大相径庭
物物交易市场；跳蚤市场；旧货市场
遭到报应；落得个悲惨的下场；不得好死
与某人达成妥协；对某人作出让步
遭到报应；落得个悲惨的下场；不得好死

bilingual.source: The players meet on a blue and green planet.
bilingual.target: 玩家们在一个蓝绿色的星球上相遇。

bilingual.source: Some fine day, we will meet again.
bilingual.target: 将来有一天，我们会再次相遇。

bilingual.source: The two lovers were destined to meet again.
bilingual.target: 这对恋人注定会再次相遇。

bilingual.source: The two rivers meet at a junction near the old bridge.
bilingual.target: 两条河在老桥附近的汇合处相遇。

bilingual.source: The bride and the groom meet at the church because it's a bad sign if the groom sees the bride before the ceremony.
bilingual.target: 新娘和新郎在教堂相遇，因为如果新郎在仪式前看到新娘，这是一个不好的信号。

list.abstract: 英文单词，有“遇见”、“想念”、“错过”等释义。英语单词meet，在汉语中有多种译法和解释，同时又是机算机语言函数和命令，用在不同的位置有不同的译法、解释及作用，应视情而定。

yingyinNormal.en: We meet. You said to find you when I wake up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们相遇，你要我苏醒之后来找你。

yingyinNormal.en: Joe? Okay. All right. So, so how did it happen? Did your eyes meet across the room?
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊。好吧，所以是怎么开始的？你们有没有双眼越过房间相遇？

yingyinNormal.en: So being able to actually meet people on this kind of journey gave me a lot of energy, gave me a lot of positivity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以在这次旅程中能与人相遇相知给我带来了满满的正能量。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: No matter who they become or where they hide, there will always be the people they meet, the people they love, the people they wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不论他们变成谁在哪里，他们永远都会跟特定的人，相遇，相爱，相怨。

yingyinNormal.en: But if they meet up again later to compare watches, less time would have elapsed on Jack's watch, balancing the fact that Jill saw the light move further.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是如果他们在实验结束后相遇比对彼此手表时，他们会发现杰克的手表会走慢一些，因此解释了这事实：吉尔看到的光移动得更远。

yingyinNormal.en: So. How's you guys meet?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们是怎么认识的？

yingyinNormal.en: Always nice to meet a fan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 见到影迷总是高兴。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you meet with Mr. Goodwin?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你与古德温先生会过面吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. So, did you get to meet her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有见到她吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'll meet you by the clay banks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在河边泥岸上见。

yingyinNormal.en: But why did you want to meet me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么那么急着想要见我？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: So where do we hit him? At the meet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那怎么办？会面的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: Harry Potter we meet again. Voldemort.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哈利波特，我们又见面了。伏地魔。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi. She says, "it's nice to meet you".
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好。她说“很高兴认识你”。

yingyinNormal.en: You have to meet me in the middle here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们总得折衷一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Nice to meet you. You're American? I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很高兴认识你。你是美国人？是。

yingyinNormal.en: What is your itinerary? To meet my maker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的行程是什么？去见我的制造者。

yingyinNormal.en: Jack? Someone here would like to meet you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克？有人想来见见你。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're saying you didn't meet with him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你是说你没有见过他吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Tony, this is my mom. Pleased to meet you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 托尼，这是我妈妈。很高兴认识你。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (make ends meet)收支相抵; 勉强维持
(meet up with)按照安排见面; 会面

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 会议；集会；聚会；偶遇；会面；会合；运动会；宗教聚会

word_family.mean: v. 遇见；碰到；与…会面；满足；达到；符合；会见；获得；结识；聚会

sense_info_list.en: fulfill or satisfy (a need, requirement, or condition)

examination_example.sentence: Even with the most extreme measures we could <highlight>meet</highlight> only 30 per cent of our fresh produce needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使采取最极端的措施，我们也只能满足30%的新鲜农产品需求。

examination_example.sentence: Under the law, using a fashion model that does not <highlight>meet</highlight> a government-defined index of body mass could result in a $85, 000 fine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这项法律，使用不符合政府定义的身体质量指数的时装模特可能会被处以8.5万美元的罚款。

examination_example.sentence: The jobseekers' allowance has <highlight>met</highlight> their actual needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 求职者的津贴满足了他们的实际需要。

examination_example.sentence: When you <highlight>meet</highlight> a person for the first time, make an effort to find the things which you and that person have in common.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你第一次和一个人见面时，努力找出你和那个人的共同点。

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>meet</highlight> new people every day: the grocery worker, the cab driver, new people at work or the security guard at the door.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你每天都会遇到新的人:杂货店的工人、出租车司机、新同事或门口的保安。

examination_example.sentence: You all came into a conversation where you first <highlight>met</highlight> the person, but after some time you may have <highlight>met</highlight> again and have forgotten their name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你们在第一次见面的地方开始了一段对话，但过了一段时间后，你们再次见到时可能忘记了他们的名字。

sense_info_list.zh: (make ends meet)收支相抵; 勉强维持

examination_example.sentence: About 72% of "unretire" respondents said that they would return to work once retired while 59% said it would be tied to making ends <highlight>meet</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约72%的“未退休”受访者表示他们将在退休后重返工作岗位，而59%的受访者表示这关乎生计。

examination_example.sentence: An increase in involuntary part-time work means that many people will be having a very hard time making ends <highlight>meet</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 非自愿兼职工作的增加意味着许多人将很难维持生计。

examination_example.sentence: feel that is enough to make ends <highlight>meet</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得这足够让收支相抵了

sense_info_list.en: encounter or be faced with (a particular fate, situation, attitude, or reaction)

examination_example.sentence: have <highlight>met</highlight> with fierce opposition
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遭到了强烈的反对

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Meet</highlight> with strong opposition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遭到强烈反对。

sense_info_list.en: get to know; get acquainted with

examination_example.sentence: Winston Churchill once walked its corridors and Japanese emissaries <highlight>met</highlight> here with Secretary of State Cordell Hull after the bombing of Pearl Harbor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 温斯顿·丘吉尔曾在这个走廊走过，珍珠港被轰炸后，日本特使曾在这里与美国国务卿科德尔·赫尔会面。

sense_info_list.zh: (meet up with)按照安排见面; 会面

examination_example.sentence: Use your lunch and coffee breaks to <highlight>meet</highlight> up with colleagues you don't always see.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利用午餐和咖啡休息时间和那些你不经常见面的同事见面。

sense_info_list.en: be in direct physical contact with
pay a financial claim or obligation
play or oppose in a contest
a sports competition

word_usage.usage:
表示“遇见”
meet指偶然相遇或在事先约好的地方与某人见面，不用被动语态。
bump into指意外地遇见相识的人。
come/run across指偶然遇见或发现某人或某物。
encounter尤指遇到困难、问题或他人的反对，也指偶遇某人。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 满足; 达到; 适合的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 会议；集会；聚会；偶遇；会面；会合；运动会；宗教聚会

word_family.mean: v. 遇见；碰到；与…会面；满足；达到；符合；会见；获得；结识；聚会

sense_info_list.en: fulfill or satisfy (a need, requirement, or condition)
sense_info_list.zh: 满足; 达到; 适合的

examination_example.sentence: The lag time it takes to add more cows to a herd to <highlight>meet</highlight> demand can result in events like cheese surplus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 向牛群中添加更多奶牛以满足需求所需的滞后时间可能会导致奶酪过剩等事件。

examination_example.sentence: Over 80% of the world's urban population is breathing air that fails to <highlight>meet</highlight> World Health Organization guidelines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球超过80％的城市人口呼吸的空气不符合世界卫生组织的准则。

examination_example.sentence: American educators, amid rising math failure rates, are debating how math can better <highlight>meet</highlight> the real-life needs of students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在数学不及格率上升的情况下，美国教育工作者正在讨论数学如何更好地满足学生的现实生活需求。

examination_example.sentence: The country is still hopeful that it will <highlight>meet</highlight> its emissions goals, like reducing emissions by 40% by 2020.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该国对实现排放目标仍充满希望，例如到2020年将减排40％。

sense_info_list.en: get together socially or for a specific purpose

examination_example.sentence: And they may also spare no efforts to <highlight>meet</highlight> their idols in person, even at all costs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且他们也可能不遗余力地亲自去见他们的偶像，甚至不惜一切代价。

examination_example.sentence: They take pop stars as their idols, seeking every chance to <highlight>meet</highlight> them in person at great expenses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把流行音乐歌星当成偶像，不惜一切代价寻找与他们见面的机会。

examination_example.sentence: He will <highlight>meet</highlight> his new manager in two weeks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两周后他将会见他的新经理。

sense_info_list.en: get to know; get acquainted with

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>met</highlight> many tourists from other countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他遇到了许多来自其他国家的游客。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the destinations I visit have stunning scenery, and I get to <highlight>meet</highlight> a variety of people from all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我参观的许多目的地都有令人惊叹的风景，我可以认识来自世界各地的各种各样的人。

sense_info_list.en: encounter or be faced with (a particular fate, situation, attitude, or reaction)

examination_example.sentence: It is estimated that to <highlight>meet</highlight> the 2050 challenge, investment must double to 83 billion US dollars a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据估计，为了迎接2050年的挑战，投资必须翻一番，达到每年830亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: Hacker's argument has <highlight>met</highlight> with opposition from other math educators.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哈克的观点遭到了其他数学教育工作者的反对。

sense_info_list.en: pay a financial claim or obligation
be in direct physical contact with
a sports competition

word_usage.usage: meet作“遇见”时，不能用于被动结构。
meet with意为“碰到；遭遇”，没有主动的意味，而meet则有主动的意味。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: fulfil 与 satisfy 基本同义, 但侧重指实现的情况好于一般标准。
指满足某种需要、要求、愿望和条件, 也可指最低限度地达到预期的标准。
多指通过书信、电话或直接会面和别人联系。口语用词。
通常指遇到困难或挫折, 也指偶然或意外地相遇。
普通用词, 本义指双方或多方从不同方向或相反方向作向对运动, 最终相碰(遇)。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 满足; 达到; 适合的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 会议；集会；聚会；偶遇；会面；会合；运动会；宗教聚会

word_family.mean: v. 遇见；碰到；与…会面；满足；达到；符合；会见；获得；结识；聚会

sense_info_list.en: fulfill or satisfy (a need; requirement; or condition)
sense_info_list.zh: 满足; 达到; 适合的

examination_example.sentence: Established bike companies and startups are embracing ebikes to <highlight>meet</highlight> demand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成熟的自行车公司和初创企业都正在拥抱电动自行车以满足需求。

examination_example.sentence: But anybody who worked for Thomas Kahoon had to <highlight>meet</highlight> his standards, and that included me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是任何为Thomas Kahoon工作的人都必须达到他的标准，我也一样。

examination_example.sentence: They get all their nutritional needs <highlight>met</highlight> by the genes that they've hijacked from the algae.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们从藻类身上获取的基因可以满足自身所有的营养需求。

sense_info_list.en: get together socially or for a specific purpose

examination_example.sentence: And then, when it's time to be social and <highlight>meet</highlight> up with your friends, you will be fully there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，到了社交和与朋友见面的时候，你会完全融入其中。

examination_example.sentence: It was just a month ago that East Juniata High School seniors <highlight>met</highlight> in the school's auditorium for graduation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在一个月前，东朱尼亚塔高中的高年级学生在学校礼堂举行了毕业典礼。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>meet</highlight> up with your friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去见你的朋友。

sense_info_list.en: get to know; get acquainted with

examination_example.sentence: Nice to <highlight>meet</highlight> you, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我也很高兴认识你。

examination_example.sentence: Smith, it's a pleasure <highlight>meeting</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 史密斯，很高兴遇见你。

sense_info_list.en: encounter or be faced with (a particular fate; situation; attitude; or reaction)

examination_example.sentence: The pediatricians' new prescription may <highlight>meet</highlight> with skepticism (怀疑) from parents
examination_example.sentence_trans: 儿科医生的新处方可能会遭到来自父母的怀疑。

examination_example.sentence: While the city council vote was <highlight>met</highlight> with applause inside the council room, opponents to the measure, including soda lobbyists, made sharp criticisms and a promise to challenge the tax in court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管市政府投票在议事厅获得了赞扬支持，但包括汽水游说者在内的反对者对这项措施提出了尖锐的批评，并承诺将在法院质疑这项征税。

sense_info_list.en: pay a financial claim or obligation

word_usage.usage: meet with意为“碰到；遭遇”，没有主动的意味，而meet则有主动的意味。
meet作“遇见”时，不能用于被动结构。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: fulfil 与 satisfy 基本同义，但侧重指实现的情况好于一般标准。
指满足某种需要、要求、愿望和条件，也可指最低限度地达到预期的标准。
多指通过书信、电话或直接会面和别人联系。口语用词。
通常指遇到困难或挫折，也指偶然或意外地相遇。
普通用词，本义指双方或多方从不同方向或相反方向作向对运动，最终相碰(遇)。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 量入为出；勉强维持生计

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 会议；集会；聚会；偶遇；会面；会合；运动会；宗教聚会

word_family.mean: v. 遇见；碰到；与…会面；满足；达到；符合；会见；获得；结识；聚会

examination_example.sentence: People were trying to help each other <highlight>meet</highlight> the challenges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们试图互相帮助来迎接挑战。

examination_example.sentence: For many of them, it's a way of <highlight>meeting</highlight> people and having a social life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他们中的许多人来说，这是与人相识，进行社交生活的一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: The last time we <highlight>met</highlight> them was at our wedding three years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们最后一次见到他们是在三年前的婚礼上。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 见面; 会面; 相遇
满足; 达到; 适合的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 会议；集会；聚会；偶遇；会面；会合；运动会；宗教聚会

word_family.mean: v. 遇见；碰到；与…会面；满足；达到；符合；会见；获得；结识；聚会

sense_info_list.zh: 见面; 会面; 相遇

examination_example.sentence: Do you get to <highlight>meet</highlight> famous actors?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能见到著名演员吗？

examination_example.sentence: I'm really looking forward to <highlight>meeting</highlight> your brother when he comes to Rome in the summer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我真的很期待在你哥哥夏天来罗马的时候能见到他。

examination_example.sentence: Before long, they got married and moved to the old house where they first <highlight>met</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久，他们结婚了，搬到了他们第一次见面的老房子里。

sense_info_list.en: get to know; get acquainted with

examination_example.sentence: You will have a much bigger bedroom, and you will <highlight>meet</highlight> new friends at your new school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会有一个更大的卧室，而且你会在你的新学校结识新朋友。

examination_example.sentence: We can give ourselves new challenges, <highlight>meet</highlight> new people, and expose our minds to new information, hobbies and skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以给自己新的挑战，结识新朋友，让我们的思想接触新的信息、爱好和技能。

examination_example.sentence: Play basketball, do yoga (瑜伽), dance and <highlight>meet</highlight> many new friends!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打篮球、做瑜伽、跳舞，以及认识很多新朋友！

sense_info_list.en: fulfill or satisfy (a need, requirement, or condition)
sense_info_list.zh: 满足; 达到; 适合的

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>meets</highlight> 16.4% of the electricity needs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它满足了16.4%的电力需求。

examination_example.sentence: Traditional food may not <highlight>meet</highlight> the needs of people in the future because of the rising population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于人口不断增长，传统食品将来可能无法满足人们的需求。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>meet</highlight> local people's tastes, Chinese restaurants have made some changes to the dishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了满足当地人的口味，中餐馆对菜式做了一些改动。

examination_example.sentence: It plays a necessary part in counterbalancing the stress responses produced in our bodies by having to <highlight>meet</highlight> exams.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在抵消我们的身体由于不得不迎接考试而产生的压力反应方面，它是必不可少的。

examination_example.sentence: Send me an email before you come to Hohhot, and I'll <highlight>meet</highlight> you at the train station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你来呼和浩特之前给我发封邮件，我会到火车站接你。

examination_example.sentence: His parents always had two jobs to make ends <highlight>meet</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父母总是做两份工作来维持生计。

word_usage.usage: meet作“遇见”时，不能用于被动结构。
meet with意为“碰到；遭遇”，没有主动的意味，而meet则有主动的意味。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指偶然相遇或在事先约好的地方与某人见面。
侧重双方静止地面对面，或指指充满勇气、信心和决心正视人或事。
偶然遇见或发现某人或某物。
词义同 come across，常可换用。
指完全达到预定的条件、要求、标准或期望、心愿等。
指最低限度地达到预期的标准，或强调要达到这个标准的困难。
